aliases.name: test
aliases.command: npx rimrafx **/TestResults && npx rimrafx **/coveragereport && cls && dotnet test --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage" && reportgenerator -reports:.\Tests\TestResults\**\coverage.cobertura.xml -targetdir:"coveragereport" -reporttypes:Html && gittey commit; start ./coveragereport/index.htm
aliases.description: runs tests and commits if the tests succeed

aliases.name: undo
aliases.description: sets project state to that of the last committed state

aliases.name: shrink
aliases.command: npx rimrafx **/bin; npx rimrafx **/obj; npx rimrafx **/TestResults; npx rimrafx **/coveragereport
aliases.description: removes all untracked files and directories

aliases.name: docs
aliases.description: sets project state to that of the last committed state

aliases.name: setup
aliases.description: sets the project up to be run
